body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
If reset point is before the update request, the update request will be lost after reset.
This is not expected in many use cases. Similar to signal, update requests are trigger from external actions like human actions, and not recoverable like activity (with idempotency). 

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Similar to reset, by default it should preserve all the update requests after reset points to re-apply to the new run. And provide an option to skip the re-apply.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
NA

**Additional context**
https://temporalio.slack.com/archives/CTQU95E84/p1681514936017749
title: Update API: preserve update request after reset like signal request
